betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Wireless Data Bank Transmission Connector and Wireless Assembly line Reception Connector lets you avoid building and connecting dozens of Data Banks and Optical Fiber Cable for the upcoming Assembly Lines you might have to build.

To use it, you have to screwdriver the Data Bank that is storing the data sticks, place a Wireless Data Bank Transmission Connector into the Data Bank, then Wireless Assembly line Reception Connector for the Assembly Lines.

[note]Wireless Data Hatches are N:M instead of 1:1[/note]
betterquesting:10.name:8: Wireless Data for Your Assembly Lines!
